There was a HISS from DINOBOT, "Then dig und=
erneath them and collapse the tunnel aboutthem.  Picking a fight by the ARK=
 is suicide as we'll be SWARMED over by MAXIMALS before we can send out a c=
omm signal."  He grins, "But I do assume if they are buried in some sort of=
 rockslide we will have all the time while they're focused on rescuing thie=
r brethren for us to secure the area."

DINOBOT remained in his beast mode =
then, scanning the are, "If they come up aboveground, make yourselves scarc=
e.  Our orders do not include being exterminated for no cause."  At least, =
not without WASPINATOR present.

He shifted to glance over at HUN-GRR to se=
e if the TERRORCON LEADER approved.  After all, he was the real one who cou=
ld keep his 'enthusiastic' minions in line now.  If he openly disagreed wit=
h DINOBOT, thier field mission would turn into bickering, which they could =
not risk so close to the enemy stronghold.
